text: Barangho tajak meuteumee mate Bah lam kutagle tapeukong leupah Meunyoe awak nyan meuteumee nyang got Jikheun nyoe keubit teuka bak Allah Meunyo hana got ubak jih teuka Jipeugah gata laju nyang salah Takheun bandum nyan teuka bak Tuhan Pakon jih meunan jahe sileupah Pakon roe meunan alah hai kawom Rap-rap han meuphom peue nyang tapeugah
